text:
Oh, good work.
You have lessons next, right?

Yea...
Not that I'm interested it them

Hey now, you shouldn't say that.
How are the others?

Well, we've settled on the concept and all,
now everyone's full of energy.

I see, that's good. In that case, you've also
got to give your best effort, Mamimi!

Since I'm not someone that's into that sort of
thing, I'll just continue on like always.
I hate troublesome things after all.

You know, Idols
are pretty troublesome, aren't they?

Eh? Well, weren't you the one
who scouted me, Producer.
